rules_text:
Vigilance, trample, lifelink
When Kami-Blessed Spiritualist enters or you spend four or more mana to cast a spell, [b][Tap up to three target nonland permanents] a[/b]nd put a stun counter on them.
Flash paradigm {3}{WU} [i](You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its paradigm cost.)[/i]
